page.title: 06Farming
page.content: {Farming}is still a pleasent way of earning a living;seasons still dictate the life and prosperity of the farmer.Pesticides,funguscides,selectiv e weed killers and plant and animal breeding has increased the productivity dramatically. {Mechanisation}has increased to such an extent that the labour force costs are reduced,and efficiency has jumped in leaps and bounds with harvestes for beet,potatoes,blackcurrents andcorn,and fork lift loaders.In affect it has made farming less back breaking and more technical. {Arable}crops have increased in the area in theten years,encouraged by the C.A.P.(Commen Agricultural Policy),including wheat,barley,beef and sheep,but now because of overproduction alternative crops are being tried,such as peas,beans,apples.
